title: nanjaiyuNDa kaNThanE
sahitya:
nanjaiyuNDa kaNThanE unait-tanjamenru nambinEn


anupallavi

  anju dEvar vAzhavE nenjirangi nIla vElai


caraNam    en manak-kaDalilE ezhum viSa sarakkellAm karma vAsanaiyelAm karuNaiyAl vizhungiyE
un ninaivamudAga Uri nirkka nIyaruL Om mnamah shivAya Om Om namah shivAya Om
